paper_abstract: This paper presents an architecture as well as circuit implementation of a ZigBee modulator/demodulator in the transceiver for personal area network, which is compliant with the physical layer of IEEE standard 802.15.4. A test prototype has been designed and fabricated using 0.18-mu m single-poly six-metal CMOS process with core area of 0.16 mm(2). The measurement results show that packet error rate (PER) is less than 1% given SNR = 5 dB. The total power consumption is merely 251 mu W at a 2.4-MHz system clock.
paper_title: ZigBee 868/915-MHz modulator/demodulator, for wireless personal area network
